amendatorysection.para: Within thirty days after receipt of a proposal developed pursuant to subsection (1) or (2) of section 68-1117, the department shall review the proposal and determine whether the proposal is eligible for funding. The department shall select three proposals for funding. The department shall enter into a contract with an independent institution having experience in evaluating aging and disability programs for an evaluation of the aging and disability resource center demonstration projects. The contract shall require that a report evaluating the demonstration projects be presented to the Clerk of the Legislature prior to December 1 of 2016, 2017, and 2018.
